channel.title: Why does no1 know omfg?!¬!@"$
channel.description:
Alrite, i've been after this since the start of november.. More than a month has passed, and still nothing...
I'm trying to get something, which will allow me to control the Height of these masks..
[code] mask100var1 mask100var2 [/code]
Yes yes, some of you may notice that it's used in the playerGfx method. Some of you may say, oh just use staticAnimation here is a method it will work i've tested it.. staticAnimation methods, and stillgfx, always face south...
I want facing gfx.. And that's the only method which does facing...
But it's only got int id, int delay...
mask100var1 = Id, E.G, 252 = Dds spec.
mask100var2 = Delay, Time the graphic is created.. Higher the number, more delay before the graphic shows...
The whole method looks like this...
[code] public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) { mask100var1 = id; mask100var2 = delay; mask100upate = true updateRequired = true; } [/code]
Now how would i change the height of mask100var1? Is there another mask?..
Someone said it's to do with the delay.. But i've tried that... All it does is make a delay on gfx.. Doesn't change the height at all.
Can someone please answer this, point me where i've got to be looking..
Have i got to add another mask myself? What file am i looking in to change height? Player/Client. Is this possible? (Yes because i've seen it on other servers)
Many thanks :|..

item.title: Why does no1 know omfg?!¬!@"$
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Lol, my playergfx doesn’t even work o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Why does no1 know omfg?!¬!@"$
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Alrite, i’ve been after this since the start of november… More than a month has passed, and still nothing…

I’m trying to get something, which will allow me to control the Height of these masks…

mask100var1
mask100var2

Yes yes, some of you may notice that it’s used in the playerGfx method. Some of you may say, oh just use staticAnimation here is a method it will work i’ve tested it… staticAnimation methods, and stillgfx, always face south…

I want facing gfx… And that’s the only method which does facing…

But it’s only got int id, int delay…

mask100var1 = Id, E.G, 252 = Dds spec.

mask100var2 = Delay, Time the graphic is created… Higher the number, more delay before the graphic shows…

The whole method looks like this…

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100upate = true
updateRequired = true;
}

Now how would i change the height of mask100var1? Is there another mask?..

Someone said it’s to do with the delay… But i’ve tried that… All it does is make a delay on gfx… Doesn’t change the height at all.

Can someone please answer this, point me where i’ve got to be looking…

Have i got to add another mask myself?
What file am i looking in to change height? Player/Client.
Is this possible? (Yes because i’ve seen it on other servers)

Many thanks :|…

Read full topic
